question: Which campaign of India has been recently appreciated by the World Health Organisation (WHO)?
option1: Fitness Ka Dose Aadha Ghanta Roz
answer: Fitness Ka Dose Aadha Ghanta Roz
explanation:
The World Health Organisation (WHO) has recently appreciated India’s initiative of ‘Fitness Ka Dose, Aadha Ghanta Roz’.
The campaign, which aims to promote physical activity, was launched as part of the nation-wide Fit India Movement. It urges all Indians to follow at least 30 minutes of fitness activities every day. This is on the lines with the WHO fitness campaign.
